events.message: I received my order last week, but the jacket doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been labelled under the Refund cluster, based on the customer's request for returning the item and obtaining money back.
The case was assigned to Customer Support Agent Amanda Lee for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues. I’m here to help!
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging? This will help us process your refund faster.
Sure, my order number is 7854321. The jacket has only been tried on indoors and is in its original box with tags attached.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and send you a prepaid return shipping label via email within the next hour.
Great, I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label. This makes the return process much easier. Thank you!
The refund request has been successfully processed and the return label has been sent to the customer’s email address.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already sent the jacket back. Thanks again for your help and support.
The case has been closed after confirming the customer’s return shipment and refund process. Customer satisfaction confirmed.
A customer satisfaction survey invitation was sent to gather feedback on the refund and support experience.
